content.question: Which of the following processes results in a decrease in entropy of a system?

choices.label: A pot of water is boiled.
Water is frozen into ice cubes.
Carbon dioxide gas is released from a pressurized container into the atmosphere.
A container of pressurized carbon dioxide is heated to a higher temperature.

content.answer: Water is frozen into ice cubes.

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
